page.title: 08The Shopping Centre,Abingdon
page.content: The paper shop employs 3 staff and 10 paper delivery staff,usually children over 13 years who get paid 50p per day. They stock newspapers,magazines, greetings cards,sweets,cigarettes, tobacco,stationery,soft drinks and toys.The wine store employs 3 staff. They stock wines,spirits,beer,cider, cigarettes,sweets and soft drinks.The opening hours (10.30am- 9.00pm)are controlled by licensing laws.The hairdresser employs 7 staff.The most popular style is a "cut and blow dry" They have both male and female customers.The surgery has 2 doctors in the practice with 60 patients.It covers a 6 mile radius.In the densists surery ,there is 1 dentist and 1,000 patients.
